Class AdminShowTimeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllerClasses.AdminSchedulerController
      • controllerClasses.AdminShowTimeController

  • public class AdminShowTimeController
extends AdminSchedulerController
    Class that communicate with ShowTimeDataControl and deal with mainly the formating the UI that deals with CRUD of time slots
    Author:
    Chang En Kai
